description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争中参战的中国人民解放军外派部队的总称。
description.en: The general term for the expeditionary force deployed by the People's Republic of China to fight in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 一场在朝鲜半岛爆发的军事冲突，主要涉及朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国，以及各自的盟友。
description.en: A military conflict that took place on the Korean Peninsula, primarily involving North Korea and South Korea, along with their respective allies.

description.zh-cn: 时任中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会主席，决策并命令中国人民志愿军入朝作战。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Central People's Government Revolutionary Military Commission, who decided and ordered the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to enter Korea.

description.zh-cn: 为保卫中国东北边境安全而组建的军事部队，是中国人民志愿军的前身。
description.en: A military force formed to defend the security of China's northeastern border, and the predecessor of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会

zh-cn: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会
en: People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的最高军事领导机关，直接领导和指挥中国人民志愿军。
description.en: The supreme military leading body in the early days of the People's Republic of China, which directly led and commanded the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军首任司令员兼政治委员。
description.en: The first Commander and Political Commissar of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中支持大韩民国的多国部队，是中国人民志愿军的主要作战对手。
description.en: The multinational military force that supported South Korea in the Korean War, and the main adversary of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量，在朝鲜战争中与中国人民志愿军并肩作战。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, which fought alongside the Chinese People's Volunteer Army in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 时任政务院副总理，据称其建议将入朝部队命名为“志愿军”而非“支援军”。
description.en: Then Vice Premier of the Government Administration Council, who reportedly suggested naming the forces entering Korea the 'Volunteer Army' instead of the 'Support Army'.

description.zh-cn: 时任军委副主席、政务院总理兼外长，在志愿军组建和入朝决策中发挥了关键作用。
description.en: Then Vice Chairman of the Military Commission, Premier, and Foreign Minister, who played a key role in the formation of the Volunteer Army and the decision to enter the war.

description.zh-cn: 时任苏共中央总书记，同意为中国人民志愿军提供空军掩护，是中国出兵的重要条件。
description.en: Then General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CPSU, who agreed to provide air cover for the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, a key condition for China's intervention.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争后期的一场著名阵地争夺战，战况异常惨烈。
description.en: A famous and extremely brutal battle for positions in the later stages of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军英雄，在上甘岭战役中用身体堵住联合国军机枪眼而牺牲。
description.en: A hero of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army who sacrificed himself by blocking a UN machine gun emplacement with his body during the Battle of Triangle Hill.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争最后一次大规模战役，主要针对拒绝停战的韩国军队。
description.en: The last major battle of the Korean War, primarily targeting South Korean forces that were resisting the armistice.

description.zh-cn: 时任大韩民国总统，在停战谈判最后阶段拒绝承认协议，企图继续战争。
description.en: Then President of the Republic of Korea, who refused to accept the armistice agreement in the final stages of negotiations, attempting to continue the war.

zh-cn: 关于朝鲜军事停战的协定

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军、中国人民志愿军与联合国军签署的旨在停止朝鲜战争中一切军事行动的协定。
description.en: An agreement signed by the Korean People's Army, the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, and the United Nations Command to cease all hostilities in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 时任中央军事委员会主席，于1994年命令召回志愿军驻板门店代表团。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Central Military Commission, who in 1994 ordered the recall of the CPV delegation from Panmunjom.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的长子，作为中国人民志愿军的一员在朝鲜战争中牺牲。
description.en: The eldest son of Mao Zedong, who died in the Korean War as a member of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中向中国人民志愿军提供了大量的军事装备和空军支持。
description.en: Provided the Chinese People's Volunteer Army with substantial military equipment and air support during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军高级将领，曾任副司令员、代司令员等职务。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, serving as Deputy Commander and Acting Commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军副司令员。
description.en: Deputy Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军副司令员。
description.en: Deputy Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 派遣中国人民志愿军参加朝鲜战争的国家实体。
description.en: The state entity that dispatched the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to participate in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 以中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会主席名义签署命令，将东北边防军改名为“中国人民志愿军”，并决定其入朝作战。
description.en: As Chairman of the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government, he signed the order to rename the Northeast Border Defense Army to the 'Chinese People's Volunteer Army' and decided on its entry into the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军由中国人民解放军东北边防军改编而成。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was reorganized from the Northeast Border Defense Army of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 志愿军入朝至停战期间，其武装力量领导职能由中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会承担。
description.en: From its entry into Korea until the armistice, the leadership functions for the Volunteer Army were undertaken by the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 于1950年10月19日跨过鸭绿江进入朝鲜参战，迅速击退联合国军，深刻影响了战争的进程和最终结局。
description.en: Crossed the Yalu River to enter the war in Korea on October 19, 1950, quickly pushing back the UN forces and profoundly influencing the course and outcome of the war.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中作为主要交战方直接对抗。
description.en: Fought directly against each other as the main adversaries in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 作为盟友在朝鲜战争中并肩作战。
description.en: Fought alongside each other as allies in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 据称，黄炎培认为'支援军'的名称容易引发国际误解，建议改为'志愿军'，以表明中国并非与美国宣战，而是人民志愿支援朝鲜。
description.en: It is said that Huang Yanpei believed the name 'Support Army' could easily cause international misunderstanding and suggested changing it to 'Volunteer Army' to indicate that China was not declaring war on the US, but that its people were voluntarily supporting Korea.

description.zh-cn: 在军委会议上，将“支援军”改为“边防军”，并提出参战部队使用“志愿军”服装和旗帜，影响了部队的最终名称和形象。
description.en: At a Military Commission meeting, changed 'Support Army' to 'Border Defense Army' and proposed that combat troops use 'Volunteer Army' uniforms and flags, influencing the force's final name and image.

description.zh-cn: 同意了周恩来提出的苏联方面提供空军掩护和负责中国主要城市领空安全的要求，为志愿军出兵提供了重要支持。
description.en: Agreed to Zhou Enlai's request for Soviet air cover and responsibility for the air defense of major Chinese cities, providing crucial support for the Volunteer Army's deployment.

description.zh-cn: 向中国人民志愿军防守的上甘岭地区阵地发起进攻，引发了上甘岭战役。
description.en: Launched an attack on the positions held by the Chinese People's Volunteer Army in the Triangle Hill area, triggering the Battle of Triangle Hill.

description.zh-cn: 在上甘岭战役中，黄继光用身体堵住了联合国军的机枪火力点。
description.en: During the Battle of Triangle Hill, Huang Jiguang blocked a UN machine gun emplacement with his body.

description.zh-cn: 针对韩国总统李承晚拒绝承认和平协议的行为，发动了金城战役，打击韩国军队。
description.en: In response to South Korean President Syngman Rhee's refusal to accept the peace agreement, launched the Battle of Kumsong to attack South Korean forces.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝承认和平协议的达成，并以“就地释放”名义将大批朝鲜人民军战俘编入韩国军队，企图破坏停战。
description.en: Refused to accept the peace agreement and forcibly conscripted a large number of KPA prisoners of war into the ROK army under the pretext of 'local release' in an attempt to sabotage the armistice.

description.zh-cn: 金城战役打击了拒绝停战的韩国军队，为最终签署停战协定清除了障碍。
description.en: The Battle of Kumsong struck the South Korean forces that were resisting the armistice, clearing the way for the final signing of the agreement.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，命令召回驻板门店军事停战委员会的中国人民志愿军代表团，结束了其在朝鲜半岛的官方使命。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central Military Commission, he ordered the recall of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army delegation from the Military Armistice Commission in Panmunjom, ending its official mission on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 为志愿军提供了绝大多数主战装备，如T-34坦克、米格-15战斗机等，并在1951年3月后帮助其逐步换装苏式武器。
description.en: Provided the vast majority of main combat equipment to the Volunteer Army, such as T-34 tanks and MiG-15 fighters, and helped it gradually re-equip with Soviet-made weapons after March 1951.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军是中华人民共和国派出的赴朝作战部队。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was the expeditionary force dispatched by the People's Republic of China to fight in Korea.
